plentry.pd: (Default) This module has no actual function. Do not set type to this value.
Video content moderation. The SDK takes screenshots and inspect videos sent by local users, and uploads the screenshots and moderation results.
Screenshots capture. The SDK takes screenshots of videos sent by local users and upload them.

pd.p: Additional information for video content moderation, with a maximum length of 1024 bytes.

The SDK sends the screenshots and additional information on the video content to the Agora content moderation server. Once the content moderation process is completed, the Agora content moderation server sends the additional information and the content moderation results to your server.
A maximum of 32 instances can be configured , and the value range of MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer in [1,32].
pd.note: A video content moderation module can only be configured with one instance at most.

plentry.pd: The number of video content moderation modules, that is, the number of configured instances, must be the same as the number of instances configured in modules. The maximum number is 32.
